sent.orig: You can have your own family cookbook with Grandma's recipe through to Martha Stewart's recipe.
sent.trans: 你的家庭菜谱既可以包含你奶奶的菜谱，也可以网罗玛莎·斯图尔特的菜谱。

sent.orig: The recipe for making the liqueur has been handed down from generation to generation.
sent.trans: 这种酿酒方法世代相传。

sent.orig: Armed with their secret family recipe, she is out to a successful pizzeria franchise!
sent.trans: 用他们的秘密家庭食谱武装，她是建立成功的比萨店特权！

sent.orig: His recipe for success in business is to take honesty asprinciple andthe customers first.
sent.trans: 他生意场上成功的秘诀是：诚信为本，顾客至上。

sent.orig: It was forbidden to use this recipe which God gave to Moses for any secular purpose.
sent.trans: 禁止使用神给予摩西的处方作为任何长期的目的。
